STR.string: {ani=waving}Hey, You found my little Easter egg. I am proud of you :)
I want to give a special thanks to the whole Revo community who allowed me to do all this.
But a big thanks goes to Jose for even allowing me to do this.
And a special thanks to IceDrag, Spirax, LFire and all the others who participated in Gartic Phone and all the other games we played. Some of you may never read this, but I miss you guys.
Please keep this a secret, will you? ;)
